Uses of Interface
golad.lib.MoveFactory

  • Packages that use MoveFactory 
    Package Description
    golad.bot
    This package provides bot related classes and interfaces.
    golad.lib.impl
    This package provides abstract and concrete implementations of the concepts defined in golad.lib

    • Uses of MoveFactory in golad.bot

      Methods in golad.bot with parameters of type MoveFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move Bot.getNextMove(MoveFactory factory, Move lastOpponentMove)
      Obtains the next move this bot will make in the given situation.

    • Uses of MoveFactory in golad.lib.impl

      Classes in golad.lib.impl that implement MoveFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMoveFactory
      An abstract implementation of a MoveFactory.
      class  DefaultAbstractMoveFactory
      An abstract implementation of an AbstractMoveFactory, supplying the Board to validate on and the player to validate for from internal variables.
